**Step 11:** Now, click on ‘Save as Draft’ and agree with the terms &amp; conditions, and submit the application form by clicking on ‘Confirm &amp; Final Submit’. 
**Instructions:**
**Note 01:** Photo uploading for all applicants is mandatory. 
**Note 02:** The application will be considered complete only when all sections are completed.
